items.sentence: Tom didn\'t expect the meeting to last so long.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to go there alone.
You\'re going to have to do that by yourselves.
She\'s smarter than Mary, but not as beautiful.
I didn\'t know that Tom couldn\'t speak French.
I want you to stay here in Boston until Monday.
I want you to stay in Boston until my birthday.
I wonder whether Tom is really studying French.
Why is it OK for men to do that, but not women?
The method Tom suggested might\'ve been better.
If you want one, you\'ll have to find your own.
Do you know any good places to eat around here?
Do you really expect Tom to tell you the truth?
I doubt a native speaker would say it that way.
Tom doesn\'t have the personality for that job.
Tom said that he didn\'t expect that to happen.
Tom said that he didn\'t sleep well last night.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to eat very much.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to hear any more.
I knew you\'d want to go to Australia with Tom.
